code: import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{add}from"../redux/Slices/CartSlice";import{remove}from"../redux/Slices/CartSlice";import toast from"react-hot-toast";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{post}=_ref;const{cart}=useSelector(state=>state);const dispatch=useDispatch();function addToCart(){dispatch(add(post));toast.success('item added');}function removeItem(){dispatch(remove(post.id));toast.error('item removed');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-between \r hover:scale-110 transition duration-300 ease-in gap-3 p-4 mt-10 ml-5 rounded-xl   shadow-[0_3px_10px_rgb(0,0,0,0.2)] ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"w-40 truncatev font-bold",children:post.title.split(" ").slice(0,5).join(" ")+"..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"w-40 text-sm text-gray-700",children:post.description.split(" ").slice(0,10).join(" ")+"..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.image,className:"h-[180px]"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-10 items-center ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-green-600 font-bold",children:["$",post.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"border border-black rounded-full px-3 py-1 text-sm\r hover:bg-black hover:text-white transition-all duration-300\r ease-in hover:scale-110",children:cart.some(p=>p.id==post.id)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:removeItem,children:"Remove Item"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addToCart,children:"Add To Cart"})})]})]});};export default Product;
